page.title: 15THE POLICEMEN
page.content: P.C. ROBERTS OUR LOCAL POLICEMAN CAME TO OUR SCHOOL AND ANSWERED QUESTIONS. THE FIRST TIME HE CAME HE WAS DRESSED IN JEANS AND TRACK SUIT TOP.ON THE NEXT VISIT HE WAS DRESSED IN HIS UNIFORM AND HELMET WHICH HE LET SOME OF US TRY ON.THIS TIME A SERGEANT CAME TOO.HE HAD THREE STRIPES ON HIS ARM.HE REMEMBERED GARETH WHO HAD BEEN CHEEKY TO HIM OVER AT THE SHOPS.WE FOUND IT VERY INTERESTING TALKING TO P.C. ROBERTS,HE WAS FRIENDLY AND WE FELT WE WOULD BE LESS SHY ABOUT GOING AND TALKING TO HIM IN THE FUTURE.WE WERE SURPRISED THAT HE WAS JUST LIKE ANY OTHER GROWN UP PERSON.HE CARRIED A TWO WAY RADIO IN HIS POCKET AND BY IT HE KEPT IN TOUCH WITH THE POLICE STATION,WE LEARNED THAT POLICEMEN CHASING SOMEONE CAN DRIVE THROUGH RED LIGHTS,AS LONG AS THEY DO NOT CAUSE ACCIDENTS OR INJURY.
